name: §4§n§lMenacing Silhouette
description:
A knight of your calibur's strength is undeniable, but as a warrior from a faraway land, your unbeknownst strength, frightens the locals. 

(Villager prices are increased)

actions.command: execute at @s as @e[type=villager,distance=..7] run data merge entity @s {Gossips:[{Target:[I;1,1,1,1],Type:'major_negative',Value:35}]}
execute at @s as @e[type=villager,distance=..7] run data modify entity @s Gossips[{Target:[I;1,1,1,1]}].Target set from entity @p UUID
